skills.name: LOUD SHOT
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Wake all allies inflicted with Sleep or Perfect Sleep.
• 35% Chance to Remove Negative Effects, including Silver Effects from each ally.
• 25% Chance to Stun the enemy for 1 turn.

skills.name: AUTHORITY
desc: • Increase DEF and MR of all allies for 2 turns.
• 35% to Grant Class Advantage to all allies for 2 turns.
• Heal any ally suffering from Sleep or Perfect Sleep to Full HP.

skills.name: GUARDIAN
desc: Cannot be Stunned, Taunted, Slept, or Frozen (including by unblockable Freeze).
